title: Exceptionally beautiful Dupklex home in the GATED community !!
posting_body: Fantastic Price for this Dupklex, which features 1 Bdrm, 1 Bath Apartments, each with Living Room, Dining Room and Kitchen!
This home is rich in elegant features and is in immaculate condition.

Light, neutral colors, cool marble floors, plantation shutters, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances.....Sliding glass doors from the family room lead to the covered lanai and brick pavered pool area.
The outdoor views are PRISTINE overlooking the pond and vast conservation area.
Lawn service and pool service provided.
One small dog will be considered with non-refundable pet fee.
